about.summary: build GUIs from functions, using magic.

name: magicgui
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "magicgui" %}
{% set version = "0.1.5" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 65e7b6845e636a302aecf2e736232aba7f9651ea782230ab4bb58627d957e893

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python
    - qtpy >=1.7.0

test:
  requires:
    - pyside2
  imports:
    - magicgui

about:
  home: "https://github.com/napari/magicgui"
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "build GUIs from functions, using magic."
  doc_url: https://magicgui.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/napari/magicgui

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - k-dominik
    - tlambert03
